build.installCommand: if [ -f pnpm-lock.yaml ]; then pnpm install --no-frozen-lockfile || pnpm install --lockfile-only && pnpm install; elif [ -f package-lock.json ]; then npm install $NPM_INSTALL_FLAGS; elif [ -f yarn.lock ]; then yarn install $YARN_INSTALL_FLAGS; elif [ -f bun.lockb ]; then bun install $BUN_INSTALL_FLAGS; else echo 'No lockfile found'; fi
